656.memo: ✘ Consumes the items. Make sure the equipment is unlocked! ➣ Rewards an Seiran (631 Air Group)

660.desc: Have a secretary ship equipped with a Maxed Expertise and Max Star Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai and then Scrap 2 Type 21 Zero Fighter and 2 Zuiun in your inventory while the quest is activated.
660.memo: ✘ Consumes the items and a Skilled Crew Member. Make sure the equipment is unlocked! ➣ Rewards a Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai (Skilled)

884.desc: Sortie Kagerou Kai Ni OR Shiranui Kai Ni OR Kuroshio Kai Ni as flagship and 2 Lv75+ Kagerou/Yuugumo-class to [W3-2], [W4-2] and [W5-3]. S-Rank each boss node twice.

282.memo: ➣ Rewards a 41cm Twin Gun Mount Kai Ni and either a New Model Artillery Armament Materials OR 5 Screws OR a Prototype 46cm Twin Gun Mount

915.memo: ➣ Rewards: ¶First choice: Either Swordfish (Seaplane Model) x1 OR Action Report x1 ¶Second choice: Either a New Type Aviation Armament Materials x1 OR Improvement Materials x4

697.name: (Limited time Spring Quest) Remodeling of the Seaplane Swordfish!
697.desc: Have Gotland as your Secretary Ship, equip the maxed modified Swordfish (Seaplane Model) in the first slot, then proceed to scrap 3 Zuiun, 3 Type 0 Recon Seaplane, 1 Type 13 Air RADAR Kai, prepare 2,500 ammo, 4000 bauxite, 1 New Type Aviation Armament Materials and 1 Skilled Pilot.
